auth.usernameMinimumRequire: Username must be at least 1 character.
auth.emailMinimumRequire: Email must be at least 1 character.
auth.phoneRequire: Phone number must contain exactly 10 digits.
auth.passwordMinimumRequire: Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.passwordMustContain: Password must contain at least one special character.
auth.passwordCannotContain: Password cannot start or end with whitespace.

form.string: This field must be a string.
